tool_description:
Easily translate text between Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Czech, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and Turkish. Source Language is optional now. Target Language can use full language or 2-3 character code (NOT case-sensitive). 

Arabic (ar), Chinese -Simplified (zh), Chinese -Traditional (zht OR chinesetraditional), Czech (cs), English (en), French (fr), German (de), Italian (it), Japanese (ja), Portuguese (pt), Russian (ru), ...
name: Text Translation
title: Text Translation

api_list.name: Translate (Text)
api_list.description: Returns only the translated text in a string format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sa-translate.p.rapidapi.com/translate/text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sa-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description: Translate text from one language to another, will return details on the translated language.
